config.script:
#system.perspective.print("New Service Button Pressed")
	#Send the message to refresh the table
	messageType = 'refreshProgramSettings'
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)

import traceback
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		### Declare parameters 
		program_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.programId
		program_name = self.view.custom.edit_data.programName
		program_desc = self.view.custom.edit_data.programDescription
		time_created = system.date.now()
		active = self.view.custom.edit_data.active
		if active == 0:
			time_retired = system.date.now()
		else:
			time_retired = None
	
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		if (program_id is None):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Program ID Error")
		elif (time_created is None):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Date Error")
		elif (program_name is None) or (len(program_name) < 1):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Program Name Error")
		else:
			valid = True
			system.perspective.print("Program Settings Data Valid")
		
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			### Check if the user is creating new data
			if program_id == -1:#Insert new data, no row_id
				#system.perspective.print("Insert New Data")
				path = "Settings/Programs/ProgramSettingsInsert"
				parameters = {"program_name":program_name,
							"program_desc":program_desc,
							"time_created":time_created}
				newProgramId = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
				#Insert the associated provider types for the program
				if len(self.view.custom.providerTypes):
					for row in range(len(self.view.custom.providerTypes)):
						programId = newProgramId
						providerTypeId = self.view.custom.providerTypes[row]
						path = "Settings/Programs/ProgramProviderTypeInsert"
						parameters = {"programId":programId, "providerTypeId":providerTypeId}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
			
			##### Check if the user is editing existing data
			elif program_id >= 0:#Update existing data on specified row_id
				#system.perspective.print("Update Exisiting Data")
				if active == 1:
					path = "Settings/Programs/ProgramSettingsUpdateActive"
					parameters =  {"program_id":program_id,
							"program_name":program_name,
							"program_desc":program_desc,
							"time_created":time_created}
				else:#Retire the program
					path = "Settings/Programs/ProgramSettingsUpdateInactive"
					parameters =  {"program_id":program_id,
							"program_name":program_name,
							"program_desc":program_desc,
							"time_created":time_created,
							"time_retired":time_retired}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)			
				#system.perspective.print("Update Data")
				#Delete and re-insert the provider types
				path = "Settings/Programs/ProgramProviderTypeDelete"
				parameters = {"programId":program_id}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				if len(self.view.custom.providerTypes):
					for row in range(len(self.view.custom.providerTypes)):
						programId = program_id
						providerTypeId = self.view.custom.providerTypes[row]
						path = "Settings/Programs/ProgramProviderTypeInsert"
						parameters = {"programId":programId, "providerTypeId":providerTypeId}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshProgramSettingsQuery", payload={}, scope="session")
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshProgramSettings", payload={}, scope="session")
		
		
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.")
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Program Settings Edit button_save")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False
